column4: Do I have to msg the nickserv to log me in everytime I connect to the channel?
what do you need help setting up?
just so it logs me in automatically, kinda new to XChat
please use regular chat
go to xchat> network list
next add the networks you want with the proper buttons
'favorite' channels are the same as 'autojoin' channels
do you still require help?
thanks got it leme restart to try
welcome back!
na didn't work I put nickserv pw but didn't logme in
have you registered the nick?
yes, if I type /msg nickserv identify mypw it works
a common mistake is not pressing enter after typing your password into the proper box, so go to the edit setting and see if your password is there
do I need a server password or connect command?
no, that is fine left blank
yea just hitting enter for the pw workd like a charm thanks
no problem! glad I could help!
Go to System > Preferences > Sessions
You have to find the command of execute, and add it to the Sessions where I told you before
I forgot where you said
Thats a better suggestion since its a script
